1.content:
While sleeping in bed with your girlfriend Payton, you catch the shrinking virus!
Waking up at the brink of dawn you realize you are 2in tall. Starting to panic you look over and see Payton is not in bed anymore, you try and think of where you can go to find her.
As you are thinking you hear a sound, the sound came from...
1.title: The beginning

choices: You rush to the end of the bed to try an get her attention.
You decide an unaware Payton is a safer option.
Before you decide, a second female voice is heard entering the room.
Payton just leaves the room before you get a chance to decide.
11.content:
"Morning sleepyhead"

As the room roars with the sound of Payton's voice as she opens the bedroom door, she must have woken up before you and is now coming to wake you up!

"Honey? Where did that boy run off to"

As you stand stunned at the marvel of your now giant girlfriend you must act quick and decide the best course of action!

You could try an get her attention but you worry she might be a bit too "Playful" with you in your new form, but the thought of your giant clumsy girlfriend mulling around with you at this size also doesn't quite sound fun either.
11.title: The bedroom you are in

choices: Yes and slams her foot on you
Yes and lifts her foot away, seeing you
No, you'll have to find another way to get her attention
14.content:
As you enter the living room you see your girlfriend, towering above you she comes off as quite intimidating, she is sitting down watching TV and eating eggs for breakfast. You approach her and try to tickle her feet.
Does she feel it?
14.title: The living room

142.content: When she lifts her foot she sees your shrunken self and yells "oh my god!" She picks you up and says "I could have stepped on you, are you trying to get smushed by my smelly feet?" and giggles a little, you didn't find it as funny. As she holds you to her face you can still smell the morning coffee in her breathe, you look at her and she is..
142.title: Yes and lifts her foot away, seeing you

1421.content:
She is smiling?! She says "look babe I have been really bored with out sex life, so I shrunk you this morning. I saw all that giantess porn you watch and I thought you might like to experience the real thing. You can worship any part of my body you want, from my mouth....to my boobs..to my big booty...or even my smelly feet if you want haha, or rather if I want, you're a little too small to get a say in this"
You were astonished at what you were hearing, she wanted you as a plaything? You tried to shake your head no but she completely ignored you.
"So lets start this morning, I'll flip a coin, and if its heads you'll spend the day in my panties, and if its tails you'll spend the day in my socks, sound fair? Great."
She flips and it lands on..
1421.title: Smiling (happy you shrank?)

14211.content:
It lands on heads, "oh my, that's fun haha, but now we have to flip for the front or the back of my panties, heads is the front, tails is the back"

She flips..
14211.title: Heads (Pussy/ass)

142112.content:
It lands on tails
"Uh oh little man, looks like my big booty is gonna eat you up today! I'm sure you are fine with that cause you like it when I sit on your face, fair warning though my butt can get a little smelly...I mean it is a butt, its where I poop out of, I'm sure you'll be fine though, as long as you don't mind a toot or two hehe"

"What you thought you were gonna spend the entire day in a butt and not get farted on? That's just unrealistic babe, you are kind-of just like a bug who got stuck in there, and nobody is gonna hold in a fart for a bug. Just enjoy my booty and If you hear a rumble try and breath through your mouth haha"

She then lowers you into her butt and stuffs you between her cheeks. You can't believe she is doing this to you, the smell in there is pretty bad but that is cause your face is up against her butthole. You hear.,..
142112.title: Tails (butt)

1421122.content:
you hear a rumble coming from her large intestine, you feel a sense of dread about what is inevitably about to happen, you hear her say "well babe it seems like you got here at a good time cause I still have a little morning gas hehe, it okay if you don't like it now, I'm sure you'll get used to it"
Pffffffttt
Her anus expands and a blast of noxious gas hits you right in the face. You try your best to breathe through your mouth but can't escape the smell. You can't believe that you found her butt attractive at some point based on how you feel about it now. Even moments after the fart hits it seems that you can still smell it lingering.

"See was that so bad" she laughed, if only she knew how bad it really was.
"Well I have a full day and shouldn't let you slow me down, I'll see you tomorrow when we flip the coin again

She stands up, she is going..
1421122.title: A rumble (oh no)

14212.content:
It lands on tails, you are stunned and don't know what to do.
"Uh oh you got my smelly feet for the day! hahaha don't worry about being crushed the shrinking stuff makes you squish-able, you can't be killed like that. But its a hell of a day to get feet because I am off to the gym today and then out with friends and I won't have time to shower in between. But its okay it'll be hot you can worship my feet like I'm a goddess or something"

She takes her sock off and dangles you above it, before dropping you in she says "enjoy your day foot boy, Tomorrow morning we will flip the coin again and see if I can take you out, this will be fun!"

She drops you in her sock, then shortly after her warm foot comes in and presses against your face, your face was in the toes side of her foot and it smelled like a locker room on a hot day. It was like she didn't wash her feet for this, you hear her on the phone above you giggling to a girlfriend about what she just did. She gets up and goes..
14212.title: Tails (feet)

info.brief_description: You are sleeping in bed with your girlfriend when you catch the shrinking virus!
info.description:
You are sleeping in bed with your girlfriend when you catch the shrinking virus! Now stuck shrunken you have to find and get the attention of your girlfriend and hope she is willing to help.

Your girlfriends name is Payton - She is a tall blonde with a big butt and small/medium boobs. 20 Years old.

Feel free to add more characters as you see fit

No rules besides no underage stuff

I enjoy and strongly encourage butt/fart material but feel free to add anything with feet/vore whatever you want.
